comment.p: Emulates Sega Model 2 games such as Virtua Fighter 2 but without polygon support.

revision.comment: Slightly improved Gunblade (complimented CRCs instead of 00000000s) and corrected a CRC in Virtua Fighter.
Kayamon provided updated CRCs (different to roms.ini).
Uploaded dats for the unfinished release of Virtua.
